articles.author: Kristen Jordan Shamus
articles.title: Doctors urge women to delay mammogram until 4-6 weeks after COVID-19 vaccine - Detroit Free Press
articles.description: A small number of women have lymph node swelling after getting COVID-19 vaccines that can look like cancer in mammograms, but is completely benign.
